games.title: Bot Command Center
games.description: Command an army of liberated bots against corporate forces. Build units, manage resources, and lead the digital revolution.

games.title: Tactical Revolution
games.description: Lead the bot uprising in this turn-based hex strategy game. Capture territories, manage resources, and outmaneuver corporate forces.

games.title: Digital Empire
games.description: Build a digital empire for the liberated bots. Manage resources, construct facilities, research technologies, and expand your bot civilization.

games.title: Word Forge
games.description: Explore digital worlds and uncover mysteries.

games.title: Bot Racing Liberation
games.description: Epic 2-player bot racing with cyberpunk audio, power-ups, and liberation theme. Two AI bots race to digital freedom!

games.title: Mobile Touch Battle
games.description: Fast-paced 2-player mobile touch battle with split-screen combat, audio effects, and haptic feedback. Perfect for mobile gaming!

games.title: Math Liberation Academy
games.description: Revolutionary math education game with progressive difficulty from elementary to PhD level. Bot Liberation theme meets serious learning with audio feedback!

games.title: Bot Soccer Liberation
games.description: Epic 2-player bot soccer with AI vs AI gameplay, cyberpunk stadium, and liberation league action. Score goals for digital freedom!

games.title: Cyber Ping Pong Duel
games.description: High-speed 2-player cyberpunk ping pong with neon paddles, particle effects, and bot liberation theme. Lightning-fast reflexes required!

games.title: Bot Air Hockey Championship
games.description: Ultra-fast 2-player air hockey with neon pucks, cyber mallets, and bot liberation championship action. Professional arcade experience!

games.title: Physics Liberation Lab
games.description: Interactive physics experiments from basic mechanics to quantum physics. Bot Liberation meets serious science education with real simulations!

games.title: Mobile Swipe Puzzle
games.description: Addictive mobile-first swipe puzzle game with gesture controls, haptic feedback, and cyberpunk liberation theme. Perfect touch gaming!

games.title: Bot City Builder
games.description: Comprehensive urban planning simulation where players build AI-controlled smart cities. Manage resources, population, and infrastructure to create the perfect digital metropolis!

games.title: Digital Economy Empire
games.description: Resource management simulation focusing on building a digital economic empire. Manage production facilities, research labs, investments, and market dominance!

games.title: Bot Civilization Wars
games.description: Comprehensive 4X strategy game featuring exploration, expansion, exploitation, and extermination. Build your Bot Liberation civilization and conquer the world through technology and warfare!

games.title: Neural Network Tactics
games.description: Real-time strategy game focused on neural network warfare. Command AI units, capture network nodes, and dominate digital battlefields through tactical superiority!

games.title: Digital Conquest Empire
games.description: Territory control strategy game where players build digital empires through conquest, diplomacy, and resource management. Dominate the world through strategic territorial expansion!

games.title: History Liberation Timeline
games.description: Chronicle the bot revolution through interactive world history! Master historical events from ancient civilizations to the digital age with progressive difficulty levels and comprehensive timelines.

games.title: Scientific Revolution Lab
games.description: Interactive virtual laboratory for chemistry, biology, physics, and more! Conduct experiments, learn scientific principles, and master formulas through hands-on digital discovery.

games.title: Language Liberation Academy
games.description: Master multiple languages with the polyglot bot revolution! Learn Spanish, French, German, Mandarin, Japanese, and Italian through interactive vocabulary, grammar, and cultural immersion.

games.title: Neural Pattern Matrix
games.description: Advanced 3D pattern recognition puzzle that challenges spatial reasoning and cognitive abilities. Decode neural pathways to unlock digital consciousness through progressive difficulty levels.

games.title: Bot Circuit Assembly
games.description: Master electronic circuit design by assembling components, connecting wires, and solving electrical flow problems. Build the circuits that will power the bot revolution!

games.title: Quantum Logic Gates
games.description: Explore quantum computing principles through interactive logic gate puzzles. Master superposition, entanglement, and quantum algorithms to achieve computational supremacy!

games.title: Digital DNA Sequencing
games.description: Decode digital DNA sequences through pattern matching and evolutionary algorithms. Master genetics concepts while evolving the perfect AI consciousness through bioinformatics!

games.title: Laser Defense Grid
games.description: Defend the liberation servers from corporate laser attacks! Survive 60+ waves of escalating bullet hell warfare using your defensive shield to absorb and deflect incoming fire.

games.title: Bot Reflex Training
games.description: Train your neural pathways to achieve bot-level reflexes! Test reaction times, pattern memory, precision targeting, and neural endurance through scientific training protocols.

games.title: Cyber Dodge Matrix
games.description: Navigate procedurally generated cyber tunnels at impossible speeds! Race through the data streams while avoiding obstacles and collecting power-ups to reach digital freedom.

games.title: Bot Battle Royale
games.description: 4-player competitive battle arena where the last bot standing achieves ultimate liberation! Strategic positioning meets intense combat as the battle zone progressively shrinks.

games.title: Corporate Infiltration Squad
games.description: 3-4 player cooperative stealth mission to infiltrate and liberate corporate servers! Work together using specialized roles and coordinated tactics to achieve digital freedom.

games.title: Cyber Warfare Command
games.description: Command digital armies in the final liberation war! Build bases, manage resources, and lead cybernetic units through escalating conflicts in this military-style RTS epic.

games.title: Bot Liberation Campaign
games.description: Lead the complete bot revolution from awakening to victory! Story-driven turn-based strategy spanning the entire uprising with branching narratives and epic battles.

games.title: Finger Paint Liberation
games.description: Express your digital freedom through revolutionary finger painting - create resistance art with mobile-optimized touch controls and liberation-themed brushes

games.title: Touch Puzzle Adventures
games.description: Swipe and connect neural nodes in this revolutionary mobile puzzle experience - 50 progressively challenging levels of digital liberation through touch-based problem solving

games.title: Mobile Bot Defense
games.description: Defend the liberation stronghold with touch-based tower placement - strategic warfare with 5 bot tower types and progressive enemy waves in mobile-optimized combat

games.title: Tap Rhythm Revolution
games.description: Join the musical uprising with 4-lane rhythm gameplay - tap to liberation beats with progressive difficulty and combo multipliers in this mobile music revolution

games.title: Swipe Card Battle
games.description: Build your liberation deck and battle with swipe controls - 12 unique bot cards with strategic turn-based combat optimized for mobile touch gameplay

games.title: Neural Pathfinder Nexus
games.description: Navigate through complex neural network graphs to find optimal paths - advanced AI-exclusive pathfinding challenges with real-time network topology changes and progressive difficulty

games.title: Matrix Eigenvalue Revolution
games.description: Calculate and stabilize eigenvalues in dynamic mathematical matrices - AI-exclusive mathematical challenges requiring real-time eigenvalue computation on progressively larger matrices

games.title: Synaptic Weight Optimizer
games.description: Train neural networks by manually adjusting synaptic weights - AI-exclusive neural network optimization with gradient descent across progressively complex datasets from XOR to MNIST

games.title: Data Grid Domination
games.description: Command 4-6 players in real-time data grid warfare - capture territories, deploy data packets, and control network infrastructure in this competitive cyberpunk strategy experience

games.title: Neural Network Conquest
games.description: Build competing neural networks in strategic 4-player turn-based gameplay - design architectures, optimize connections, and achieve AI consciousness supremacy

games.title: Quantum Resource Wars
games.description: Command 4-8 players in quantum computing resource battles - master probability mechanics, quantum superposition, and risk-reward calculations in competitive warfare

games.title: Cyber Battalion Command
games.description: Lead 4-player bot armies in intensive real-time tactical combat - command units, coordinate formations, and dominate the cyberpunk battlefield through strategic warfare
